comments.body: @andschwa it's hacky, but does the job. If you fine with such approach, I will update docs.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
I'd say that I don't think this needs to be a switch for SMA. It could certainly just take an arbitrary string for the directory you want to rebuild.

But at that point, you might be better off just knowing to `cd src/project; dotnet build`.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I'm not super convinced this is needed. All it does is cause Start-PSBuild to run `dotnet build` in a particular project, right? Plus it leaves you with the same problem: the library isn't updated in the output path.
